description: Styles for the Tic Tac Toe frontend application, defining layout, color scheme, and responsive design.

classes.name: App
classes.description: Main styling for the App component including layout and background properties.

classes.name: game-container
classes.description: Styles for the game container that centralizes the content with padding.

classes.name: game-title
classes.description: Styles for the title of the game, including color and font size.

classes.name: mode-button
classes.description: Styles for the buttons that select the game mode, including active state.

classes.name: status
classes.description: Styles for the display status in the game, distinguishing it with color.

classes.name: game-board
classes.description: Styles that define the layout of the game board using grid properties.

classes.name: square
classes.description: Styles for each square in the Tic Tac Toe grid, including hover and filled states.

classes.name: reset-button
classes.description: Styles for the reset button, including hover effects.
